title: Rethinking Radiology Report Generation via Causal Inspired Counterfactual Augmentation
details: X Song, J Liu, Y Liu, Y Li, W Lei, R Wang - Proceedings of the 15th ACM International …, 2024
abstract: Radiology Report Generation (RRG) draws attention as a vision-and-language interaction of biomedical fields. Previous works inherited the ideology of traditional language generation tasks, aiming to generate paragraphs with high readability as …
